snippet.title: Back Then - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Back Then is a first-person narrative indie game developed by Octopus Embrace. Players will be taken on a journey into the mind of Thomas Eilian, an elderly writer diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease. With gameplay focused on interactions, puzzles, and detective exploration, players will discover more about Thomas and his family by unlocking new rooms, collectibles, objectives, and puzzles. By interfacing with the House and Dreamlike Sequences of the game, players will uncover what Thomas Eilian's life truly meant. Back Then is launching on December 8 for PC.

#BackThen
